attributes.action: Ban smart phones for under 16 year olds.
attributes.additional_details: To keep children safe on line, to prevent peer pressure, to reduce violence and to promote children’s innocence by not being exposed to adult content.
attributes.background: Only allow basic mobile phones for children below the age of 16 years old.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/655473
